---
title: "Computing access"
---

To access RStudio for this class, go to the [datahub](https://posit.cloud/spaces/405361) space for this course.

Students enrolled in this course will automatically have access to RStudio through UCSD's datahub. Use your UCSD login to access this course and select the COGS 137 environment.

If you do not have access and have *just* enrolled in the course, please give it 24 hours after enrollment to have access. Once a student has Canvas access to the course, they will also have datahub access.
